short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share secrets or passwords easily with a simple link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secret Sharer is designed for secure and simple sharing of sensitive information like tokens and passwords. Generate single-use, encrypted links that allow recipients to access shared secrets, which automatically expire after a predetermined period for enhanced security. Perfect for safe, temporary transmission of confidential data.
